text: The next composite profile is an example of a weekly volume profile. Again you can see how composite profiles can really illustrate to us what the bigger picture You know, whilst traditional candlesticks appear to show us that this market is trending, the volume profiling actually shows us, or the composite profile shows us, that it's not trending per se, but rather grinding higher. Now, the difference between a market that's trending showing initiative that's aggressive, and a market that's grinding, is simply that this market is spending a lot more time accepting, you know, various prices. the trend and we would use this sort of analysis to determine which part of the trend we are in. In this example I would say we're actually approaching the backend of the trend as we can see the market starting to see or slow up and the momentum starting to slow and the aggression you know having been taken out of the marketplace. Let's now look at what a monthly compster profile would look like.
